title: Powerful Features to Automate Customer Service
subtitle: AberoAI keeps conversations moving, routes to humans when needed, and gives you data to improve—all on WhatsApp.

instant.title: AI Autoreply 24/7
instant.desc: “Reply in under 60 seconds, anytime, anywhere.” AberoAI keeps conversations alive 24/7, even when your staff is offline. The result: saved bookings, happier customers, and no lost sales opportunities.

multitenant.title: Multi-tenant Management
multitenant.desc: “One dashboard, complete control of every branch.” Manage HQ and branches in one platform with role-based access per branch or staff. Organized, secure, and ready to scale.

analytics.title: Realtime Analytics Dashboard
analytics.desc: “Decisions powered by data, not guesswork.” Track conversations, response times, and customer satisfaction in real time to optimize ROI and spot trends from day one.

handoff.title: Human Handoff
handoff.desc: “Smart AI, your staff are still the heroes.” When things get complex or sensitive, AberoAI routes the chat to a human agent—without breaking the flow.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.desc: “Automatic multilingual service without limits.” Serve customers in multiple languages including English and Turkish—feel professional and expand globally with ease.

booking.title: Booking & After-care Automation
booking.desc: “Faster bookings, guaranteed follow-ups.” From scheduling and reminders to after-care messages—everything runs automatically to reduce no-shows and grow loyalty.
